Two Questions about Finding Paradoxine
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Two Questions about Finding Paradoxine
By Azulazulazula on Wednesday, February 15, 2012 - 05:55 pm:

1. How much intelligience is require to open the hidden path?

2. How much is required to actually /find/ the Paradoxine? I've sent my Baku/Kato to Torles many a time, both with intelligience ~575, and yet I can't come back with paradoxine. The location is the large cave, next to the leaning tower and the igloo, correct?

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, February 16, 2012 - 09:23 am:

Rank affects finding things more than stat levels, try a monster at B level or greater.

Yes, that's the cave, I'm not certain how much Int it takes to knock things down to get there.

By Azulazulazula on Thursday, February 16, 2012 - 01:36 pm:

Thanks, Lisa! That was really helpful! The Baku was C-Rank. :P Got it up to A-Class, went back, got the Paradoxine!
